 <style>
 html { height: 100%; } body { height: 100%; overflow-x: hidden; } .container { height: 100%; width: 70%; margin: 0 auto; } .footer { /* position: absolute; */ /* bottom: 0; */ width: 100%; background-color: #00338D; color: #fff; padding: 20px; } .hero-image { height: 100px; margin-bottom: 50px; background-color: #00338D; } .logo { background: url(logo.svg) no-repeat; height: 100px; width: 80%; position: absolute; top: 8px; left: 270px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: left; } .logo h2 { color: #fff !important; margin: 0; padding-left: 100px; } .grid__row { padding: 0 20px; } .no-margins { margin: 0 !important; } .no-paddings { padding: 0 !important; } .image-placeholder { width: 100%; height: 150px; background-color: #aaa; } .border-bottom { border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; }
 </style>
 <title> NRMA Insurance </title>
  </head>
 <body>
